categories.name: Location(s)
categories.url: https://data-service.theglobalfund.org/v3.3/odata/VGrantAgreements?$apply=filter(contains(GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,<value>) OR contains(GeographicAreaName,<value>) OR contains(ComponentName,<value>) OR contains(GrantAgreementTitle,<value>))/groupby((GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,GeographicAreaName),aggregate(GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))&$orderby=count desc

categories.name: Grant(s)
categories.url: https://data-service.theglobalfund.org/v3.3/odata/VGrantAgreements?$select=grantAgreementTitle,grantAgreementNumber,grantAgreementStatusTypeName&$filter=(contains(GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,<value>) OR contains(GeographicAreaName,<value>) OR contains(ComponentName,<value>) OR contains(GrantAgreementTitle,<value>) OR contains(GrantAgreementNumber,<value>) OR contains(PrincipalRecipientName,<value>) OR contains(PrincipalRecipientShortName,<value>) OR contains(GrantAgreementStatusTypeName,<value>))&$orderby=GrantAgreementStatusTypeName asc,GrantAgreementTitle asc

categories.name: Result(s)
categories.url: https://data-service.theglobalfund.org/v3.3/odata/VReportingResults?$apply=filter(reportingResultYear eq 2019 AND (contains(GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,<value>) OR contains(GeographicAreaName,<value>) OR contains(componentName,<value>) OR contains(ReportingResultIndicatorName,<value>)))/groupby((reportingResultIndicatorName,reportingResultIndicatorId), aggregate(ReportingResultValue with sum as value))&$orderby=value desc

categories.name: Document(s)
categories.url: https://data-service.theglobalfund.org/v3.3/odata/VProgramDocuments?$select=programDocumentId,processName,componentName,processYear,processWindow,fileURL,documentTypeDescription&$filter=documentTypeDescription in ('Application','Country Profiles') AND (contains(GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,'HIV') OR contains(GeographicAreaName,'HIV') OR contains(ComponentName,'HIV'))&$orderby=processYear desc, processWindow desc
